name: Space Escape (Sasashasa, Admiral "Foreskin", Desm1t)
description: You found yourself on an abandoned space racing station, where you wanted to collect an exotic organic fuel called "Kosmukh". But as soon as you filled the ship's tank, the ancient stone race "Chikshulub" appeared in the system, which feeds on organic matter, and coincidentally, "Kosmukh" is their favorite delicacy. To avoid becoming a snack for dinner, you need to get out of this sector as soon as possible!
